pages.text: $(bpurple)Zombies$() are crazy creatures that feed on brains. $(l)They are enemies with plants and also attack players and Crazy Dave$(). There are many types of zombies, some can walk on the road; some can drive a car, some can dive in the sea, there are even zombies that can ride a dolphin.

There are various rewards for killing zombies, players can get $(bgreen)TreeXp$() when they and their plants kill zombies. Zombies have chances to drop $(borange)Coins(silver coins, gold coins)$(), $(bblue)Gems$(), $(borange)Chocolate$(), plant seeds, origin essence and so on. If you kill a zombie surrounded by $(bgreen)green light$(), it will definitely drop $(l)Energy$(). If you kill a zombie surrounded by $(byellow)yellow light$(), it will definitely drop $(byellow)Sun$().
